scripts.uglify: rm -rf ./dist/js && cd dist && mkdir js && cd ../  && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.imagemin: cd dist && mkdir images && cd ../  &&  imagemin src/images dist/images -p
scripts.icons: svgo -f src/images/icons && mkdir -p dist/images && svg-sprite-generate -d src/images/icons -o dist/images/icons.svg
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:jsx: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.build:images: npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell 'npm run start' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js'
scripts.git:commit: git pull && git add . && git commit -m "uploade" && git push
scripts.build:cssminx: lessc  src/less/index.less  src/css/index.css  &&  lessc --compress  src/less/index.less  src/css/index.min.css
scripts.backbuild:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.backbuild:images: npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts.backbuild:js: npm run lint && npm run uglify
